fields.headline: This is how  to help ...
fields.bodyText: After reading the stories of the ten babies some readers may wish to offer help. Below are a list of some charities who helped us with advice while reporting of their short lives and their web site addresses. · Kenya: Oxfam www.oxfam.co.uk · Sudan: Unicef www.unicef.org · Congo: Memisa www.memisa.be/index.html · Ghana: Actionaid Action Aid's Greater Accra Programme (Ghana) www.actionaid.org.uk · Uganda: Actionaid www.actionaid.org.uk · Malawi: Concern Worldwide www.concern.net · Tanzania: Actionaid www.actionaid.org.uk · Zambia: Actionaid www.actionaid.org.uk ·Nigeria: Actionaid www.actionaid.org.uk
